name: DeLay Of DeLand
description:
DeLay Of DeLand is a tactical game that puts the emphasis on the real heroes of ancient wars: the messengers.

Command your troops on a grid through messages to defend your Fortress again the neverending flow of enemies.

Tutorial:

Your objective is to survive.

Death is inevitable.

The only way to command your troops is to rely on your brave Messengers.

  1. Click on a Messenger and drag to draw their Route.
    1. The Messenger Route must begin and end at your Fortress.
  2. Once the Route is complete, you can click on one of the cells and drag to create a Move Command.
    1. You can create multiple Move Commands per Route.
    2. Once you release, that sequence of cells will be the Move Command.
  3. Once you’re happy with your message, press the Send Message button to send the Messenger on its way.
  4. The messenger will shout the Commands on their way, regardless of who’s in that cell.

Hopefully someone will be listening.

Good luck.

Hints: 

  1. The Messengers rest at the Fortress.
  2. Blue is a healing color.
  3. Have the numbers advantage.
  4. Different units have different strengths and weaknesses.
  5. Don't get swamped.
